title: Set up External Account for Transfers
description: A customer wants to link an account from another bank to be able to transfer funds.

tasks.description: Collect the routing and account number for the external bank account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the external account details.
Agent starts the process where two small deposits will be sent to the external account for verification.

tasks.description: Explain to the customer that they will need to verify the amounts of the micro-deposits once they appear.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly instructs the customer on the next steps they need to take to complete the setup.
